sentences.sentence: There are four (4) double cross bollards on the real boat.
sentences.translation: 有四（ 4 ）双交叉护柱，对真正的船民。

sentences.sentence: Mooring bollards being fabricated from steel tube and solid bar.
sentences.translation: 系泊柱正在编造由钢管和固体酒吧。

sentences.sentence: You can also see in this photo that I began making the double cross bollards!
sentences.translation: 您也可以看到在这方面的照片，我开始把双交叉护柱！
